description: Serve these along side chicken satay kebabs for an Eastern-inspired family feast.
name: Lemongrass-marinated Prawn Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 red chilli, deseeded and roughly chopped
2 stalks lemongrass, bottom one-third only, peeled of hard layers, and roughly chopped
1 fresh root ginger, 3cm piece, finely chopped
1 lime, 1 tbs juiced and cut into wedges (wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a barbecue for cooking. To make the marinade, simply put all the ingredients, except the prawns, in a blender or food processor and blitz to a fine paste.
Toss the king prawns in the marinade, cover, and leave in the fridge to marinate for 1 hour. Meanwhile, soak 8 bamboo skewers in water, as this will help to stop them burning on the barbecue.

Thread 5 prawns onto each skewer, threading through the top and bottom of the prawn to make a curved shape. Grill the prawns on the barbecue for 2-3 minutes on each side, until pink and charred in places. Serve with a squeeze of lime.
